Welcome to PynamiX’s documentation!¶

This code is made up of the following modules:

  • io

  • measure

IO¶

Measure¶

pynamix.io.load_seq(filename, nt=None, ny=None, nx=None, varian=False)¶

Load an SEQ file and optionally reshape it if given values for nt,nx and ny

pynamix.io.save_as_tiffs(pathname, b, vmin=0, vmax=65535, angle=0, gray=True, logscale=False)¶

Convert an appropriately shaped SEQ file into TIFF files. Optionally takes an angle to rotate the images by.
